titles.title: A resolution commending Patricia Sue Head Summitt, head women's basketball coach at the University of Tennessee, for three decades of excellence as a proven leader, motivated teacher, and established champion.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/6/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends Patricia (Pat) Sue Head Summitt, the University of Tennessee women's basketball coach, for three decades of excellence as a proven leader, motivated teacher, and established champion.
